note.p: Daughter of the Rev. William Willets and Catherine Wedgwood, sister of Josiah Wedgwood I. Married Swinton Colthurst Holland (1777–1827) at Knutsford, Cheshire, in 1805.
England, Cheshire parish registers, 1538–2000 (Familysearch.org, accessed 14 June 2021)
Global, Find a Grave Index for burials at sea and other select burial locations, 1300s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 August 2022)
Gloucestershire, England, Church of England burials, 1813–1988 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 June 2021)
